title: SpaceX’s first Starlink V2 satellites spotted at Starbase
summary: On Monday, SpaceX was spotted loading some of the first Starlink V2 satellite prototypes into a custom mechanism designed to refill Starship’s...

title: The SLS rocket finally has a believable launch date, and it’s soon
summary: The major remaining task? Arming the rocket's flight termination system.

title: Millennium Space reveals results of DARPA’s ‘Red-Eye’ smallsat experiment
summary: The DARPA-funded Red-Eye experiment demonstrated capabilities such as on-board data processing, inter-satellite communications and software-defined radios.

title: NASA Sets Coverage for Russian, European Spacewalk
summary: NASA will provide live coverage of a spacewalk on Thursday, July 21, by a Russian cosmonaut and an ESA (European Space Agency) astronaut to continue outfitting the European robotic arm on the International Space Station’s Nauka laboratory.

title: OneWeb and Hanwha partner to tap Australia’s military broadband market
summary: OneWeb and two subsidiaries of South Korean conglomerate Hanwha Group have partnered to explore the joint provision of connectivity services to the Australian defense market.
